div.p: The School District of Mauston will begin e-Learning on March 30, 2020.Â Please see information below for eLearning resources and food service.

p.span: Hello Grayside Elementary on a Tuesday from WGES! Thank you for joining us. Have a great evening.

Congratulations to Kristen Laridaen, our Senior in the Spotlight this afternoon! (Note: All MHS and iLEAD Seniors were given the opportunity to participate in Senior Spotlight) NAME: Kristen Laridaen...

This morning we shine the "Senior Spotlight" on Joshua Eckerman (Please note that all MHS and iLEAD seniors were given the opportunity to participate in this Facebook feature!) Name: Joshua Eckerman...
We have added another Facebook profile frame to support our 2020 graduating class. We are so proud of you all!
Good rainy Monday Grayside students! Here is your WGES broadcast for Monday, April 27. Stay healthy - we miss you! #YouRock
The Mauston High School College and Career Center would like to share resource(s) from the Wisconsin Department of Public Instruction (DPI): A Focus on Mental Health and Wellness During School...

Good Morning Mauston School District! All MHS and iLEAD seniors were given the opportunity to participate in Senior Spotlight. Today we congratulate: Name: Isabell Kemper Hometown: Dane, Wisconsin ...
